jp.gr.java_conf.dyama.rink.parser

Interface SentenceReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnnotatedSentenceReader, CoNLLXSentenceReader

    public interface SentenceReader

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the reader.
      boolean hasAnySentences()
      Checks whether the reader can read any sentences or not.
      boolean read(Sentence sentence)
      Reads one sentence.

    • Method Detail

      • hasAnySentences

        boolean hasAnySentences()
                        throws IOException
        Checks whether the reader can read any sentences or not.
        Returns:
        true if the reader can read some sentences, otherwise false
        Throws:
        IOException

      • read

        boolean read(Sentence sentence)
             throws IOException
        Reads one sentence.
        Parameters:
        sentence - the object to save the reading sentence information.
        Returns:
        true if the reader can read a sentence, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the sentence is null.
        IOException - if it fails to read.

      • close

        void close()
           throws IOException
        Closes the reader.
        Throws:
        IOException - if it fails to close.
